titleStmt.title: Terentius Christianus, sive Comœdiæ duæ, Terentiano stylo conscriptæ ad vsum scholarum seorsim excusæ. Tobaeus. Iuditha. His accessit pseudostratiotes, fabula iocosa ac ludicra. Authore Cornelio Schonaeo.
titleStmt.author: Schonaeus, Cornelis, ca. 1541-1611.
Terence.

publicationStmt.publisher: [Printed by Thomas Snodham] ex typographia Societatis Stationariorum,
